info.description: Bangkok Property Matchmaking Platform API docs
info.title: Bangkok Property Matchmaking Platform

get.description: Get all agreements

post.description: Create an agreement by parsing the body

get.description: Get an agreement by its id

404.description: Could not find the specified agreement

500.description: Could not get agreement by id

delete.description: Delete an agreement by its id
delete.summary: Delete an agreement by id *use cookies*

patch.description: Update an agreement status by id with **status** and **cancelled_message**(optional)
patch.summary: Update an agreement status by id *use cookies*

get.description: Get all appointments

post.description: Create an appointment by parsing the body (note is optional)

400.description: Empty dates or some of appointments duplicate with existing one

get.description: Get the appointment and other related information by id
get.summary: Get an appointment by id *use cookies*

404.description: Could not find the specified appointment

500.description: Could not get appointment by id

delete.summary: Delete an appointment by id *use cookies*

patch.description: Update an appointment status by id with **status** and **cancelled_message**(optional)
patch.summary: Update an appointment status by id *use cookies*

get.description: Callback from google / register redirect. Basically put all query strings to this request.
Get current users chat
Get messages chatting with recvUserId. Pagination is available.
get.summary: Get messages in a chat with recvUserId *use cookies*

get.description: Create payment

post.description: Send a verification email to the user

get.description: says hello, world
Redirect to this endpoint to login with Google OAuth2. When logging in is completed, the redirection to /register in client will occur.
Get payment by user id
Get history payment by user id
get.summary: Get history payment by user id

get.description: Get all properties or search properties by query

parameters.description: Pagination limit per page, max 50, default 20
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Pagination page index as 1-based index, default 1
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: Sort in format `<json_field>:<direction>` where direction can only be `desc` or `asc`. Ex. `?sort=selling_property.price:desc`
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: Filter in format `<json_field>[<operator>]:<value>` where operator can only be greater than or equal `gte` or less than or equal `lte`. Multiple filters can be done with `,` separating each filters. Ex. `?filter=floor_size[gte]:22,floor_size[lte]:45.5`
parameters.name: filter

post.description: Create a property with formData *upload property images (array of images) in formData with field `property_images`. Available formats are .png / .jpg / .jpeg

get.description: Get property by its id

delete.description: Delete a property, owned by the current user, by its id

patch.description: Update a property with formData *upload **NEW** property images (array of images) in formData with field `property_images`. Available formats are .png / .jpg / .jpeg *If you want to keep the old images, you need to include them in the formData with field `image_urls` as an array of strings

post.description: Add property to the current user favorites

delete.description: Remove property to the current user favorites

get.description: Get all ratings
Get rating by property id
Get rating by property id sorted by newest
get.summary: Get rating by property id sorted by newest

get.description: Get rating by property id sorted by rating
get.summary: Get rating by property id sorted by rating

post.description: Create user with formData **\***upload profile image in formData with field `profile_image`. Available formats are .png / .jpg / .jpeg

get.description: Get top 10 properties with the most favorites, sorted by the number of favorites then by the newest properties
Get a user by its id

delete.description: Delete a user by its id

get.description: says hello to current user
Get current user info
Get all agreements related to the user
Get all appointments related to the user
Get all properties that the current user has added to favorites

parameters.description: Pagination limit per page, max 50, default 20
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Pagination page index as 1-based index, default 1
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: Sort in format `<json_field>:<direction>` where direction can only be `desc` or `asc`. Ex. `?sort=selling_property.price:desc`
parameters.name: sort

get.description: Get current user financial information
get.summary: Get current user financial information *use cookies*

put.description: Update the current user financial information with data from the body
put.summary: Update the current user financial information *use cookies*

500.description: Could not update user financial information

put.description: Update specifying userId with formData **\***upload profile image in formData with field `profile_image`. Available formats are .png / .jpg / .jpeg
put.summary: Update current user personal information *use cookies*
